r.s: The source code for the PEAR website package voting
r.d: The pearweb_pepr package contains backend and frontend code for the package voting part of pearweb as well as the layout for it
r.n: - Migration to QF2 for everything but pepr-proposal-editing [clockwerx] - Remove BBCode (in favour of only supporting Text_Wiki from now on) [till] - Small refactoring while debugging [till] - Fix Bug #16578 Unable to use https URL in "Links" section [saltybeagle]
